KitKat::

She looked up at Hydras, "Commander, may I have a word with you?"
She walked closer to him. " I have an idea. Suppose we tell the 
maximals that we have the cure. But, in order to get it, we will not 
risk exposure to the plague. They will have to come and get it from 
us. If they fall for it, they will lower thier defences long enough 
for an outer attack. And those who come to us will get exposed to the 
plague as well as come to us to be killed."  She grinned evilly. 
Quickly she regained her composure. "If the idea pleases you 
commander."
